storyTitle: As Team Lead, I want to generate performance reports to evaluate team productivity against KPIs

testCases.title: Generate performance report with selected KPIs
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to access performance reporting module
Performance data exists in the system for the selected time period
At least one KPI is configured in the system
Task and attendance databases are accessible

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with options to select KPIs, time periods, and generate report button visible

steps.action: Select one or more KPIs from the available KPI dropdown list
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and displayed in the selection area

steps.action: Select time period by choosing start date and end date from date picker
steps.expectedResult: Selected time period is displayed and accepted by the system with no validation errors

steps.action: Click on 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is displayed within 5 seconds showing selected KPIs, trend analysis with visual graphs, and benchmark analysis comparing against historical data

steps.action: Review the generated report for accuracy of KPI metrics
steps.expectedResult: Report displays accurate performance metrics, trend lines showing performance over time, and benchmark comparisons with clear visualizations

postconditions: Performance report is successfully generated and displayed
Report data matches the selected KPIs and time period
System logs the report generation activity
Report is available for export or scheduling

testCases.title: Export performance report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to access performance reporting module
Performance report has been successfully generated and is displayed on screen
Browser has permission to download files
Sufficient storage space available on local machine

steps.action: Generate performance report by selecting KPIs and time period, then clicking 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is displayed with all KPI metrics, trends, and benchmark analysis visible

steps.action: Locate and click on 'Export to PDF' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF generation and download process with progress indicator shown

steps.action: Wait for PDF download to complete and open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded successfully with filename format 'Performance_Report_[Date].pdf', file opens correctly showing all report data including KPIs, charts, trends, and benchmarks with proper formatting

steps.action: Return to the performance report screen and click on 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel file generation and download process with progress indicator shown

steps.action: Wait for Excel download to complete and open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded successfully with filename format 'Performance_Report_[Date].xlsx', file opens correctly in Excel or compatible application showing all report data in structured format with separate sheets for different data sections if applicable

steps.action: Verify data accuracy in both exported files against the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel exports contain identical data to the on-screen report with all KPIs, metrics, trends, and benchmarks accurately represented

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains complete report data
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains complete report data
Both files are accessible and readable
Export activity is logged in the system
Original report remains displayed on screen

testCases.title: Schedule automated performance report delivery
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to schedule automated reports
Performance reporting module is accessible
Email service is configured and operational
At least one valid recipient email address is available
KPIs are configured in the system

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module and locate 'Schedule Report' or 'Automated Delivery' option
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling options button or link is visible and clickable

steps.action: Click on 'Schedule Report' or 'Automated Delivery' button
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling UI is displayed showing fields for report configuration, frequency selection, time selection, recipient list, and format options

steps.action: Select KPIs to include in the scheduled report from the available KPI list
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the schedule configuration

steps.action: Select report frequency (Daily, Weekly, Monthly) from the frequency dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Selected frequency is displayed and additional relevant options appear (e.g., day of week for weekly, date for monthly)

steps.action: Set the delivery time using time picker
steps.expectedResult: Selected time is displayed in the schedule configuration

steps.action: Enter recipient email addresses in the recipients field, separating multiple addresses with commas or semicolons
steps.expectedResult: Email addresses are validated and displayed as tags or list items, invalid emails show error messages

steps.action: Select report format (PDF, Excel, or both) from format options
steps.expectedResult: Selected format(s) are highlighted and included in the schedule configuration

steps.action: Click 'Save Schedule' or 'Activate Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: System validates all inputs, displays success message 'Schedule saved successfully', and shows the schedule in the list of active schedules with all configuration details

steps.action: Wait for the scheduled time to arrive or trigger a test delivery if available
steps.expectedResult: System sends report emails at the scheduled time

steps.action: Check recipient email inbox(es) for the scheduled report
steps.expectedResult: Email is received with subject line containing 'Performance Report', email body contains report summary or link, and correct report file(s) in selected format(s) are attached with accurate data

steps.action: Open the attached report file(s) from the email
steps.expectedResult: Report attachments open correctly showing complete performance data with selected KPIs, trends, and benchmarks for the configured time period

postconditions: Automated report schedule is saved and active in the system
Schedule appears in the list of active schedules
Recipients receive scheduled reports at configured times
Schedule can be edited or deleted by authorized users
System logs all scheduled report deliveries

storyTitle: As Team Lead, I want to benchmark team performance against historical data to identify improvement opportunities

testCases.title: Generate benchmarking report comparing current and historical KPIs
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to access benchmarking features
Historical performance data exists in the database for comparison
Current performance data is available in the system
At least one KPI is configured for benchmarking
Performance and historical databases are accessible

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with standard reporting options and benchmarking option visible

steps.action: Locate and click on 'Benchmarking' option or tab within the performance reporting interface
steps.expectedResult: Benchmarking interface is displayed showing options to select KPIs, current time period, and historical comparison period

steps.action: Select one or more KPIs from the available KPI dropdown list for benchmarking analysis
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and displayed in the selection area with checkmarks or tags

steps.action: Select current time period by choosing start date and end date for current performance data
steps.expectedResult: Current time period is displayed and accepted with no validation errors

steps.action: Select historical comparison period by choosing the historical time range or selecting predefined periods (e.g., same period last year, previous quarter)
steps.expectedResult: Historical period is displayed and accepted, system validates that historical data exists for the selected period

steps.action: Click on 'Generate Benchmarking Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request, displays loading indicator, and begins retrieving current and historical KPI data

steps.action: Wait for benchmarking report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Benchmarking report is displayed within 5 seconds showing side-by-side comparison of current vs historical KPIs

steps.action: Review the comparative data section of the report
steps.expectedResult: Report displays accurate comparative data with current KPI values, historical KPI values, variance percentages, and performance indicators (improvement/decline) clearly marked

steps.action: Review the visualizations section of the report
steps.expectedResult: Report displays clear visualizations including trend lines showing performance over time, bar charts comparing current vs historical performance, performance gap indicators, and color-coded visual cues for improvements (green) and declines (red)

steps.action: Verify data completeness and accuracy by cross-referencing key metrics
steps.expectedResult: All selected KPIs are present in the report with accurate calculations, percentages, and trend directions matching the underlying data

postconditions: Benchmarking report is successfully generated and displayed
Report contains accurate comparative analysis of current vs historical data
Visualizations clearly show trends and performance gaps
System logs the benchmarking report generation activity
Report is available for export or scheduling

testCases.title: Export benchmarking report
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to export benchmarking reports
Benchmarking report has been successfully generated and is displayed on screen
Browser has permission to download files
Sufficient storage space available on local machine

steps.action: Generate benchmarking report by selecting benchmarking option, KPIs, current and historical periods, then clicking 'Generate Benchmarking Report'
steps.expectedResult: Benchmarking report is displayed showing comparative data, visualizations, trends, and performance gaps

steps.action: Locate the export options in the report toolbar and click on 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF generation process with progress indicator or loading message displayed

steps.action: Wait for PDF generation and download to complete
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded successfully with filename format 'Benchmarking_Report_[Date].pdf', browser shows download completion notification

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using PDF reader application
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens correctly displaying complete benchmarking report with all comparative data, KPI comparisons, trend visualizations, performance gap charts, and proper formatting maintained including headers, footers, and page breaks

steps.action: Verify that all visual elements are rendered correctly in the PDF
steps.expectedResult: All charts, graphs, trend lines, and visual indicators are clearly visible and properly formatted in the PDF with legends and labels intact

steps.action: Return to the benchmarking report screen in the application and click on 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel file generation process with progress indicator or loading message displayed

steps.action: Wait for Excel generation and download to complete
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded successfully with filename format 'Benchmarking_Report_[Date].xlsx', browser shows download completion notification

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file using Excel or compatible spreadsheet application
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens correctly displaying benchmarking report data in structured format with separate sheets or sections for summary data, detailed comparisons, and raw data if applicable

steps.action: Verify data structure and accuracy in the Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file contains all comparative data in tabular format with columns for current KPIs, historical KPIs, variance, percentage change, and trend indicators; charts and graphs are embedded or data is formatted for easy chart creation

steps.action: Compare data in both exported files against the on-screen benchmarking report
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel exports contain identical data to the on-screen report with all KPIs, comparative metrics, trends, and performance gaps accurately represented without data loss

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains complete benchmarking report
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains complete benchmarking data
Both files are accessible, readable, and properly formatted
Export activity is logged in the system
Original benchmarking report remains displayed on screen
Files can be shared with stakeholders for review

testCases.title: Schedule automated benchmarking report delivery
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with valid credentials
User has authorization to schedule automated benchmarking reports
Performance reporting module with benchmarking features is accessible
Email service is configured and operational
At least one valid recipient email address is available
Historical data exists in the system for benchmarking
KPIs are configured for benchmarking

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module and access the benchmarking section
steps.expectedResult: Benchmarking interface is displayed with options for report generation and scheduling

steps.action: Locate and click on 'Schedule Benchmarking Report' or 'Automated Delivery' button
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling UI is displayed showing fields for benchmarking configuration, KPI selection, comparison period settings, frequency selection, time selection, recipient list, and format options

steps.action: Select KPIs to include in the scheduled benchmarking report from the available KPI list
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the schedule configuration with checkmarks or tags

steps.action: Configure comparison settings by selecting how historical data should be compared (e.g., same period previous year, rolling comparison, quarter-over-quarter)
steps.expectedResult: Comparison settings are displayed and saved in the schedule configuration

steps.action: Select report frequency (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Quarterly) from the frequency dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Selected frequency is displayed and additional relevant options appear based on frequency choice

steps.action: Set the delivery time using time picker or time input field
steps.expectedResult: Selected time is displayed in the schedule configuration in proper format (e.g., 09:00 AM)

steps.action: Enter recipient email addresses in the recipients field, adding multiple addresses separated by commas or using add button for each recipient
steps.expectedResult: Email addresses are validated in real-time, valid emails are displayed as tags or list items, invalid emails trigger error messages with specific validation feedback

steps.action: Select report format (PDF, Excel, or both) from format options checkboxes or radio buttons
steps.expectedResult: Selected format(s) are highlighted or checked and included in the schedule configuration summary

steps.action: Review the schedule summary showing all configured settings
steps.expectedResult: Schedule summary displays all settings including KPIs, comparison method, frequency, time, recipients, and format in a clear, readable format

steps.action: Click 'Save Schedule' or 'Activate Schedule' button to finalize the automated delivery setup
steps.expectedResult: System validates all inputs, displays success message 'Benchmarking report schedule saved successfully', and shows the schedule in the list of active schedules with status 'Active' and next delivery date/time displayed

steps.action: Navigate to the scheduled reports list or dashboard to verify the new schedule appears
steps.expectedResult: New benchmarking report schedule is listed with all configuration details visible including schedule name, frequency, next run time, and recipients count

steps.action: Wait for the scheduled time to arrive or use 'Send Test Report' function if available
steps.expectedResult: System triggers report generation and email delivery at the scheduled time or immediately for test

steps.action: Check recipient email inbox(es) for the scheduled benchmarking report
steps.expectedResult: Email is received with subject line containing 'Benchmarking Report' or similar identifier, email includes report generation date and time period covered

steps.action: Review the email body content
steps.expectedResult: Email body contains executive summary of key benchmarking insights, highlights of significant performance changes, and clear indication of attached report file(s)

steps.action: Verify that correct report file(s) are attached to the email in the selected format(s)
steps.expectedResult: Report attachments are present in the specified format(s) (PDF and/or Excel) with appropriate file names and file sizes indicating complete reports

steps.action: Open and review the attached benchmarking report file(s)
steps.expectedResult: Report attachments open correctly showing complete benchmarking data with selected KPIs, current vs historical comparisons, trend visualizations, performance gap analysis, and accurate data for the configured time periods

postconditions: Automated benchmarking report schedule is saved and active in the system
Schedule appears in the list of active schedules with correct configuration
Recipients receive scheduled benchmarking reports at configured times with correct attachments
Schedule can be viewed, edited, paused, or deleted by authorized users
System logs all scheduled benchmarking report deliveries with timestamps and recipient information
Email delivery status is tracked and available for review

storyTitle: As Team Lead, I want to schedule automated performance report delivery to keep stakeholders informed

testCases.title: Create and save performance report schedule
preconditions: User is logged in as Team Lead with scheduling permissions
Performance report data is available in the system
At least one valid recipient email address is available
User has access to performance report scheduling feature

steps.action: Navigate to the performance reports section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance reports page is displayed with available options

steps.action: Click on 'Schedule Report' or 'Automated Delivery' button
steps.expectedResult: Scheduling interface is displayed with configuration options including schedule frequency, time, recipients, and report parameters

steps.action: Select report type as 'Performance Report' from the dropdown menu
steps.expectedResult: Performance Report is selected and relevant configuration fields are enabled

steps.action: Define schedule frequency (e.g., Daily, Weekly, Monthly) and select specific time (e.g., 9:00 AM)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule frequency and time are accepted and displayed in the configuration form

steps.action: Enter or select recipient email addresses in the recipients field (e.g., stakeholder1@company.com, stakeholder2@company.com)
steps.expectedResult: Recipient email addresses are validated and added to the recipients list

steps.action: Configure additional report parameters such as date range, metrics to include, and report format (PDF/Excel)
steps.expectedResult: All parameters are accepted and displayed correctly in the form

steps.action: Click 'Save Schedule' or 'Create Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: System validates all inputs and displays a success message 'Schedule saved successfully' with schedule ID

steps.action: Verify the newly created schedule appears in the list of scheduled reports
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is listed with correct details including frequency, next execution time, and recipients count

postconditions: Performance report schedule is saved in the system
Schedule is active and ready for automated execution
Schedule appears in the scheduled reports list
Audit log entry is created for schedule creation

testCases.title: Verify automated performance report delivery
preconditions: A performance report schedule has been created and saved
Schedule is configured with valid recipients
Schedule execution time is set to a near-future time for testing
Email server is configured and operational
Test recipient email accounts are accessible for verification

steps.action: Note the scheduled report generation time from the scheduled reports list
steps.expectedResult: Next execution time is clearly displayed (e.g., 'Next run: 2024-01-15 09:00 AM')

steps.action: Wait for the scheduled report generation time to arrive and pass (allow 2-3 minutes buffer for processing)
steps.expectedResult: System time reaches and passes the scheduled execution time

steps.action: Navigate to the scheduled reports execution logs or history section
steps.expectedResult: Execution log shows the recent report generation with status 'Success' or 'Completed' and timestamp

steps.action: Access the recipient email inbox (stakeholder1@company.com)
steps.expectedResult: Email inbox is accessible and displays received emails

steps.action: Locate the performance report email by subject line and sender
steps.expectedResult: Performance report email is received with correct subject line (e.g., 'Scheduled Performance Report - [Date]') from the system sender

steps.action: Open the performance report email and verify email body content
steps.expectedResult: Email contains professional formatting, introduction text, and report summary or attachment reference

steps.action: Download and open the attached performance report file
steps.expectedResult: Report file opens successfully in the specified format (PDF/Excel) without errors

steps.action: Review report content including metrics, data values, charts, and date range
steps.expectedResult: Report data is accurate, complete, matches the configured parameters, and includes all expected performance metrics

steps.action: Verify all configured recipients received the report by checking additional recipient inboxes
steps.expectedResult: All recipients (stakeholder2@company.com, etc.) have received identical performance report emails

steps.action: Return to the system and verify the execution log shows successful delivery to all recipients
steps.expectedResult: Execution log displays 'Delivered to X recipients' with success status and no error messages

postconditions: Performance report is successfully generated and delivered
All configured recipients received the report email
Execution is logged with success status
Next scheduled execution time is updated in the system
Report data remains accurate and accessible
